column1: only white cells should be filled out. Blue are only haeders. Grey are documentation / empy cells
column2: Enter a variable name for the new indicator you want to create. This should be the same for all rows within one indicator block (dark blue heading)
column3: Enter the name of the variable going into the composite indicator. The  spelling must exactly match the column header in the dataset - select from the drop down. This should be the same for one input variable block (light blue header)
column5: value that the variable takes on to be counted in the composite indicator. All answers not specified will be counted as 0
column6: weight in the composite indicator if the variable takes on the value in D

column7: Copy this  block and add it below to create additional indicators
